36 typedef Mutation::Numerics::Equals<double> Equals;
37 typedef Mutation::Numerics::MinusEquals<double> MinusEquals;
38 typedef Mutation::Numerics::PlusEqualsTimes<double> PlusEqualsTimes;
39 typedef Mutation::Numerics::MinusEqualsTimes<double> MinusEqualsTimes;

45 
46 template <typename Reactants, typename Products>
47 void swap(
48  ThirdbodyReactionStoich<Reactants, Products>& left,
49  ThirdbodyReactionStoich<Reactants, Products>& right)
50 {
51  std::swap(left.m_reacs, right.m_reacs);
52  std::swap(left.m_prods, right.m_prods);
53  std::swap(left.mp_alpha, right.mp_alpha);
54  std::swap(left.m_ns, right.m_ns);
55 }
56 
57 //==============================================================================
58 
59 template <typename Reactants, typename Products>
60 void ReactionStoich<Reactants, Products>::contributeToJacobian(
61  const double kf, const double kb, const double* const conc,
62  double* const work, double* const sjac, const size_t ns) const
63 {
64  // Need to make sure that product species are zeroed out in the work
65  // array (don't need to zero out whole array)
66  for (int i = 0; i < Products::nSpecies(); ++i)
67  work[m_prods(i)] = 0.0;
68 
69  // Compute the derivative of reaction rate with respect to the reactants
70  // and products (all other terms are zero)
71  m_reacs.diffRR(kf, conc, work, Equals());
72  m_prods.diffRR(kb, conc, work, MinusEquals());
73 
74  // Only loop over the necessary species
75  for (auto& pi : m_index_stoich)
76  for (auto& pj : m_index_stoich)
77  sjac[pi.first*ns+pj.first] += pi.second * work[pj.first];
78 }
79 
80 //==============================================================================
81 
82 template <typename Reactants, typename Products>
83 void ThirdbodyReactionStoich<Reactants, Products>::contributeToJacobian(
84  const double kf, const double kb, const double* const conc,
85  double* const work, double* const sjac, const size_t ns) const
86 {
87  const double rrf = m_reacs.rr(kf, conc);
88  const double rrb = m_prods.rr(kb, conc);
89  const double rr = rrf - rrb;
90  double tb = 0.0;
91 
92  for (int i = 0; i < ns; ++i) {
93  work[i] = mp_alpha[i] * rr;
94  tb += mp_alpha[i] * conc[i];
95  }
96 
97  m_reacs.diffRR(kf, conc, work, PlusEqualsTimes(tb));
98  m_prods.diffRR(kb, conc, work, MinusEqualsTimes(tb));
99 
100  for (auto& p : m_index_stoich)
101  for (int j = 0; j < ns; ++j)
102  sjac[p.first*ns+j] += p.second * work[j];
103 }
104 
105 //==============================================================================
106 
107 template <typename Reactants>
108 void JacobianManager::addReactionStoich(
109  JacStoichBase* p_reacs, JacStoichBase* p_prods, const StoichType type,
110  const Reaction& reaction)
111 {
112  if (reaction.isThirdbody()) {
113  // Thirdbody reactions
114  for (int i = 0; i < m_thermo.nSpecies(); ++i)
115  mp_work[i] = 1.0;
116  if (m_thermo.hasElectrons())
117  mp_work[0] = 0.0;
118 
119  for (int i = 0; i < reaction.efficiencies().size(); ++i)
120  mp_work[reaction.efficiencies()[i].first] =
121  reaction.efficiencies()[i].second;
122 
123  switch (type) {
124  case STOICH_11:
125  m_reactions.push_back(
126  new ThirdbodyReactionStoich<Reactants, JacStoich11>(
127  p_reacs, p_prods, mp_work, m_thermo.nSpecies()));
128  break;
129  case STOICH_21:
130  m_reactions.push_back(
131  new ThirdbodyReactionStoich<Reactants, JacStoich21>(
132  p_reacs, p_prods, mp_work, m_thermo.nSpecies()));
133  break;
134  case STOICH_22:
135  m_reactions.push_back(
136  new ThirdbodyReactionStoich<Reactants, JacStoich22>(
137  p_reacs, p_prods, mp_work, m_thermo.nSpecies()));
138  break;
139  case STOICH_31:
140  m_reactions.push_back(
141  new ThirdbodyReactionStoich<Reactants, JacStoich31>(
142  p_reacs, p_prods, mp_work, m_thermo.nSpecies()));
143  break;
144  case STOICH_32:
145  m_reactions.push_back(
146  new ThirdbodyReactionStoich<Reactants, JacStoich32>(
147  p_reacs, p_prods, mp_work, m_thermo.nSpecies()));
148  break;
149  case STOICH_33:
150  m_reactions.push_back(
151  new ThirdbodyReactionStoich<Reactants, JacStoich33>(
152  p_reacs, p_prods, mp_work, m_thermo.nSpecies()));
153  break;
154  }
155  } else {
156  // Not thirdbody reactions
157  switch (type) {
158  case STOICH_11:
159  m_reactions.push_back(
160  new ReactionStoich<Reactants, JacStoich11>(
161  p_reacs, p_prods));
162  break;
163  case STOICH_21:
164  m_reactions.push_back(
165  new ReactionStoich<Reactants, JacStoich21>(
166  p_reacs, p_prods));
167  break;
168  case STOICH_22:
169  m_reactions.push_back(
170  new ReactionStoich<Reactants, JacStoich22>(
171  p_reacs, p_prods));
172  break;
173  case STOICH_31:
174  m_reactions.push_back(
175  new ReactionStoich<Reactants, JacStoich31>(
176  p_reacs, p_prods));
177  break;
178  case STOICH_32:
179  m_reactions.push_back(
180  new ReactionStoich<Reactants, JacStoich32>(
181  p_reacs, p_prods));
182  break;
183  case STOICH_33:
184  m_reactions.push_back(
185  new ReactionStoich<Reactants, JacStoich33>(
186  p_reacs, p_prods));
187  break;
188  }
189  }
190 }
191 
192 //==============================================================================
193 
194 bool JacobianManager::getJacStoich(
195  const std::vector<int>& stoich_vec, JacStoichBase** p_stoich,
196  StoichType& type) const
197 {
198  switch (stoich_vec.size()) {
199  case 1:
200  *p_stoich = new JacStoich11(stoich_vec[0]);
201  type = STOICH_11;
202  return true;
203  case 2:
204  if (stoich_vec[0] == stoich_vec[1]) {
205  *p_stoich = new JacStoich21(stoich_vec[0]);
206  type = STOICH_21;
207  } else {
208  *p_stoich = new JacStoich22(stoich_vec[0], stoich_vec[1]);
209  type = STOICH_22;
210  }
211  return true;
212  case 3:
213  if (stoich_vec[0] == stoich_vec[1]) {
214  if (stoich_vec[1] == stoich_vec[2]) {
215  *p_stoich = new JacStoich31(stoich_vec[0]);
216  type = STOICH_31;
217  } else {
218  *p_stoich = new JacStoich32(stoich_vec[0], stoich_vec[2]);
219  type = STOICH_32;
220  }
221  } else {
222  if (stoich_vec[1] == stoich_vec[2]) {
223  *p_stoich = new JacStoich32(stoich_vec[1], stoich_vec[0]);
224  type = STOICH_32;
225  } else if (stoich_vec[0] == stoich_vec[2]) {
226  *p_stoich = new JacStoich32(stoich_vec[0], stoich_vec[1]);
227  type = STOICH_32;
228  } else {
229  *p_stoich = new JacStoich33(
230  stoich_vec[0], stoich_vec[1], stoich_vec[2]);
231  type = STOICH_33;
232  }
233  }
234  return true;
235  default:
236  return false;
237  }
238 }
239 
240 //==============================================================================
241 
242 void JacobianManager::addReaction(const Reaction& reaction)
243 {
244  // Need to figure out which class of reaction stoichiometries this
245  // reaction belongs to
246  JacStoichBase* p_reacs;
247  JacStoichBase* p_prods;
248  StoichType reacsType;
249  StoichType prodsType;
250 
251  if (!getJacStoich(reaction.reactants(), &p_reacs, reacsType)) {
252  throw InvalidInputError("reaction", reaction.formula())
253  << "Reactants' stoichiometry is not implemented in "
254  << "JacobianManager.";
255  }
256 
257  if (!getJacStoich(reaction.products(), &p_prods, prodsType)) {
258  throw InvalidInputError("reaction", reaction.formula())
259  << "Products' stoichiometry is not implemented in "
260  << "JacobianManager.";
261  }
262 
263  switch (reacsType) {
264  case STOICH_11:
265  addReactionStoich<JacStoich11>(
266  p_reacs, p_prods, prodsType, reaction);
267  break;
268  case STOICH_21:
269  addReactionStoich<JacStoich21>(
270  p_reacs, p_prods, prodsType, reaction);
271  break;
272  case STOICH_22:
273  addReactionStoich<JacStoich22>(
274  p_reacs, p_prods, prodsType, reaction);
275  break;
276  case STOICH_31:
277  addReactionStoich<JacStoich31>(
278  p_reacs, p_prods, prodsType, reaction);
279  break;
280  case STOICH_32:
281  addReactionStoich<JacStoich32>(
282  p_reacs, p_prods, prodsType, reaction);
283  break;
284  case STOICH_33:
285  addReactionStoich<JacStoich33>(
286  p_reacs, p_prods, prodsType, reaction);
287  break;
288  }
289 
290  delete p_reacs;
291  delete p_prods;
292 }
293 
294 //==============================================================================
295 
296 void JacobianManager::computeJacobian(
297  const double* const kf, const double* const kb, const double* const conc,
298  double* const sjac) const
299 {
300  const size_t ns = m_thermo.nSpecies();
301  const size_t nr = m_reactions.size();
302 
303  // Make sure we are staring with a clean slate
304  std::fill(sjac, sjac+ns*ns, 0.0);
305 
306  // Loop over each reaction and compute the dRR/dconc_k
307  for (int i = 0; i < nr; ++i)
308  m_reactions[i]->contributeToJacobian(
309  kf[i], kb[i], conc, mp_work, sjac, ns);
310 
311  // Finally, multiply by the species molecular weight ratios
312  for (int i = 0, index = 0; i < ns; ++i) {
313  for (int j = 0; j < ns; ++j, ++index)
314  sjac[index] *= m_thermo.speciesMw(i) / m_thermo.speciesMw(j);
315  }
316 }
